# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input)
    result = ""
    line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n$word "
            line_length = length(word) + 1
        else
            result *= "$word "
            line_length += length(word) + 1
        end
    end
    return result
end
```

Example:
```julia
input_str = "This is a sample string for word wrapping"
wrapped_output = wrap_string(input_str; text_width=10)
println(wrapped_output)
```

wrapping
